bridge.tips_one: When you change the routerâ€™s network mode, you may need to re-connect all your client devices.
bridge.tips_two: When you use Access Point/Extender/WDS mode, you may not connect to this UI again. You can Press and hold the reset button for 4 seconds to revert to router mode.
bridge.note_one: OpenVPN or WireGuard client is enabled. Please disable them before setting up bridge mode.
bridge.note_two: Captive Portal is enabled. Please disable it before setting up bridge mode.
bridge.access_router_wds_tips: After bridging is successful, the router will automatically obtain an IP from the main router. If you need to access this router's UI, you must connect using the IP obtained from the main router. To get this IP, check the connected clients list in your main router's UI. If you do not have access to the main router's UI, you can restore the routing mode by holding down the reset button for 4 seconds.
bridge.access_router_ext_tips: After bridging is successful, if you need to access the UI of this router, you must manually configure your PC/mobile phone to a static IP address in the same range as the router. If you still cannot access it, you can restore the routing mode by holding down the reset button for 4 seconds.
bridge.reset_mac_tips: Please reset your MAC to factory MAC in MAC clone.
bridge.set_up_ap_tips: To set up Access Point mode, you need to connect an Ethernet cable to the WAN port first.
bridge.remove_wan_tips: Please remove the Ethernet cable from the WAN port.
bridge.router_desc: Create your own private network. The router will act as NAT, firewall and DHCP server.
bridge.ap_desc: Connect to a wired network and broadcast a wireless network.
